title: Desire, Identity & Temptation - Do our desires define us? ---- (Silence of the Lambs)
description:
Is what we desire a definition of who we are? Is there even a relationship between our desires and our identity? Where do our desires come from? What is the connection between what we see in our minds and what we are tempted to do? These are some of the things that I was pondering in this video. I didn't say everything I was thinking about here. But then again when does anyone?
.....

And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 
(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 

Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 

Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. 
From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Swimming Against the Stream

Byrne

#identity #temptation #desires
